endpoints.description: Fetch the current preferences and purchasing history for a specific user to personalize suggestions.
Update the user's preferences based on recent interactions and feedback to enhance personalization.
Obtain a list of recommended products for a user, customized based on their purchase history and preferences.
Retrieve a comprehensive list of available products within the personal care category to include in the recommendation engine.
Integrate with active marketing campaigns to deliver promotional offers that complement the product recommendations.
Fetch the current promotional offers linked to specific products, which can be shown alongside recommendations.
Access analytics data related to user engagement and behavior to fine-tune personalization strategies.
Submit feedback on the accuracy of the personalized recommendations, aiding in the refinement of the AI model.
View the history of recommendations and interactions made to a specific user to evaluate effectiveness.
Check the health status and availability of the service to ensure seamless integration and minimum downtimes.
